Translations.Text: Dang er sa quexin tamen zhong youren bu xinyang shi, ta shuo:“Shei yuan wei an la zhi dao er zuo wo de zhushou?”[Ta de] mentumen shuo:“Women yuan wei an la zhi dao er zuo ni de zhushou, women quexin an la, qiu ni zuozheng women shi guishun zhe [musilin].
Women de zhu a! Women quexin ni suo jiang shi de jingdian, women zhuisui zhe wei shizhe [er sa], qiu ni ba women jilu zai zuozheng zhe de hanglie zhong.”
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] wangtu mouhai [er sa], er an la yong jimou. An la shi zui shanyu yong jimou de.

Dangshi, an la shuo:“Er sa a! Wo jiang rang ni siqu, jiang ba ni rong sheng dao wo zheli lai, jiang chengqing bu xinyang zhe dui ni de wangyan [ru er sa shi an la zhizi de wangyan], jiang shi zhuisui ni de ren you yu bu xinyang zhe, zhidao fuhuo ri [zhu]. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai, wo jiang wei nimen panjue nimen suo fenqi de.
Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, wo jiang zai jinshi he houshi yancheng tamen, tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ta [an la] jiang rang tamen huode tamen ying de de baochou. An la jue bu xihuan bu yi zhe.
Zhe shi wo xiang ni [mu sheng] xuandu de qishi he ruizhi de yuyan [“gulanjing”].”
Zai an la kan lai, er sa de qingkuang jiu xiang a dan de qingkuang yiyang. Ta [an la] yong nitu chuangzao ta [a dan], ranhou, ta [an la] xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi ta [a dan] jiu youle.
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, gu ni buyao chengwei huaiyi zhe.

Zai [zhexie] zhishi [er sa shi an la de puren he shizhe] jianglin ni [mu sheng] zhihou, shei yu ni zhenglun ta [er sa], name, ni shuo:“Nimen lai ba! Rang women zhaoji women de ernu he nimen de ernu, women de funu he nimen de funu, women ziji he nimen ziji, ranhou, rang women [qiancheng] qiqiu an la, rang women kenqiu ta [an la] qianze shuohuang zhe.”
Zhe que shi [er sa de] zhenshi de gushi. Chu an la wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu. An la que shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Jiaru tamen beiqi [zhenli], name, an la dui zuo'e zhe que shi quanzhi de.

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“You jing ren a! Nimen lai ba! Zai women he nimen zhi jian dacheng yi zhong gongping xieyi: Women zhi chongbai an la, bu gei ta shezhi renhe pei wu; women renhe ren dou bu she an la er ba ziji ren dang zhuzai [zhu].” Jiaru tamen beili, name, nimen jiu shuo:“Qing nimen zuozheng women shi guishun zhe [musilin].”
You jing ren a! Nimen weisheme yao zhenglun yi bu la xin ne?“Tao la te” he “yin ji lei” shi zai ta zhihou cai jiang shi de, nandao nimen buming li ma?
Nimen zhexie ren a! Nimen zhenglun ziji zhidao de shi [shi keyi lijie de], dan nimen weisheme yao zhenglun ziji suo bu zhidao de shi ne? An la zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao.
Yi bu la xin ji bushi youtai jiaotu, ye bushi jidu jiaotu, er shi yi wei zunxing zhengjiao [yisilan jiao] de musilin, bushi bai ouxiang zhe.
Yu yi bu la xin zui hao de ren jiushi zhuisui ta de ren, zhe wei xianzhi [mu sheng] he xinshimen. An la shi xinshimen de baohu zhe.
You jing ren zhong youxie ren xiwang shi nimen mi wu, qishi, tamen zhi neng shi ziji mi wu, dan tamen mei renshi dao.
You jing ren a! Nimen ji yi jianzheng an la de jixiang [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong dui mu sheng jiang jiang shi de yuyan] shi zhenshi de, nimen weisheme hai yao fouren ne?
You jing ren a! Nimen weisheme yao guyi yijialuanzhen, yincang zhenli ne?
You jing ren zhong de yixie ren shuo:“Nimen ke zai zaoshang xinyang jiang shi gei xinshimen de [jingdian], dan nimen zai wanshang jiu ying fouren ta, yibian tamen fanhui yuan jiao.

Nimen zhi neng xinren zunxing nimen de zongjiao zhe.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“[Zhenzheng de] zhengdao que shi an la de zhengdao.[Nimen buyao xiangxin] youren hui shou ci xiang nimen suo shou ci de [qishi],[chufei ta zunxing nimen de zongjiao], fouze,[fuhuo ri] tamen bi zai nimen de zhu nali tong nimen zhenglun.” Ni shuo:“Enhui quan zai an la de zhangguan zhong, ta ba enhui ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe.” An la shi kuan en de, quanzhi de.
Ta [an la] ba ta de enhui te ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.
